TopicTitle: When did you buy KSP? (I want to know how many people waited for it to come out of Early Access)

Articles.Content: Got it back in .23, less than a week before .23.5 came out
I got the demo in 2011, and bought 0.16, a few months before 0.17 came out.
I bought it December 23, 2016 during the Christmas sale.
I got it in 1.0.5, though I have not been on the forums since then.
End of April, 2012 - which would be in 0.14...

I bought the game just a few weeks after 0.11 came out - that being, end of October in 2011. I've seen the game come a **long** way since then, looking back at what the game used to be you can still see resemblance of the current game - even still, so much has changed that it seems a completely different game at the same time.

As soon as the GNU/Linux build was available.  

No GNU/Linux build == no purchase.
I bought it early on, around version 0.9 I think

way back in the dawn of time, a very bored me was looking for something similar but different to  ms flight sim or orbiter, there was this weird game on some forum that I normally do not read, full version.

I wasn't able to get it to run on my new win 7 laptop, so I placed it in the "check back later" file.

several years later I remembered this odd little game, and went searching.

found that it had grown wonderfully in my absence, that was .23 or so (just before the building destructables and after the new buildings). Bought it right then
April 2014. Oh well, guess I'll have to pay for Making History.
I was gifted KSP on Christmas 2013, so I think .21. I remember downloading the Asteroid Redirect update. I joined the forums in 2016.
Early January 2016, I think. Must have been version 1.0.5, if I am not mistaken.
i bought it when .90 was out. best 20 euro investment of my life
I think it was 0.21 for me.  Definitely before destroyable buildings.
